content: Hello everyone,We are excited to introduce LotteryHub, a fully decentralized lottery built on Binance Smart Chain. Our dapp utilizes smart contract technology to provide a tamper-proof, transparent, and fair lottery experience for all users.Features:A user-friendly interface that allows for easy ticket purchasing and lottery creationAs a lottery creator you can specify the duration, ticket cost, maximum participants, how many tickets a single address can buy and the fees that you will receive in the endThe ability for users to view past lottery results and winnersAutomatic calls for drawing a lottery when the duration ends or all tickets boughtLow cost per lotteryOur team has put a lot of effort into creating a platform that is not only secure but also user-friendly. With LotterryHub, players can purchase lottery tickets with just a few clicks, and lottery creators can easily set up and manage their own lotteries.We believe that our platform has the potential to revolutionize the lottery industry by providing a decentralized and transparent alternative to traditional centralized lottery systems.Getting Started:To get started with LotteryHub, simply visit our website https://lotteryhub.io and connect your Binance Smart Chain wallet. From there, you can purchase lottery tickets or create your own lottery.You can also follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/LottHub_io and Telegram https://t.me/lotteryhub_io for updates and announcements!We are confident that LotteryHub will provide a new and exciting gambling experience for users on Binance Smart Chain. We look forward to seeing you on our platform and wish you the best of luck in all your lottery endeavors!Soon we are planning to launch on more low fees networks like Polygon, PulseChain and others...
